heading: HR00885
0:
RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THROUGH THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS AND THE DEFEAT COVID-19 AD HOC  COMMITTEE, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON
THE SURGE OF COVID-19 INFECTION AMONG REPATRIATED DISPLACED
OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS AND REPORTED RISKY AND DISMAL
SITUATION IN QUARANTINE FACILITIES, AND RECOMMEND URGENT
MEASURES TO PROTECT AND SUPPORT OFWs

status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00885
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THROUGH THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS AND THE DEFEAT COVID-19 AD HOC COMMITTEE, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SURGE OF COVID-19 INFECTION AMONG REPATRIATED DISPLACED OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS AND REPORTED RISKY AND DISMAL SITUATION IN QUARANTINE FACILITIES, AND RECOMMEND URGENT MEASURES TO PROTECT AND SUPPORT OFWs
